casebody.data:
Conrad J. LEVIN, Plaintiff in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 10, 1928. No. 228. Frank, Weil & Strouse, of New York City (Samuel B. Frank, of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff in error. L. W. Breed, and Oliver D. Burden, both of Syracuse, N. Y., for the United States.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
